data.actual_result: Dark theme: input text hard to see (can be confused with a placeholder text), on light theme the theming of the whole bar is just bad
data.expected_result: Search bar correctly themed: input text decently visible and nice background color on both themes
data.short_description: Incorrect theming of the search bar: on Dark theme the input text is barely visible, and on light theme the background of the bar doesn't fit at all
data.steps_to_repro: - Set you theme to Dark - Observe Search bar - Set you theme to White - Observe Search bar
